title: Did Warren Buffett propose this plan, which could repair the budget deficit?
subtitle: Warren Buffett made fun of a law that says that at any time there is a deficit of more than 3% of GDP, all current members of Congress are not eligible for re-election.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Warren Buffett said he could end the deficit by passing a law that said that at any time there was a deficit of more than 3% of GDP.
